entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow or rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
